infra.TopologicalCoordinate.description: Defines a topological coordinates on the track

description: Defines a border point is used to separate the railway network due to different reasons. Typical examples are country borders, the change of owning infrastructure manager or the border of a station

id.description: Identity of the object; used for referencing

fromCountryCode.description: Defines the from country code for the national border in the direction of linear element

toCountryCode.description: Defines the to country code for the national border in the direction of linear element

name.description: User-friendly name, only if different from id
